column1: What then is the eﬀect, in law, of the plain(cid:415)ﬀ-respondent being “allowed to retain”
the land described in the schedule to P6-which is also, as set out already, the land
more fully described in the schedule to the plaint-and further referred to as a por(cid:415)on
of agricultural land “owned” by the statutory lessee? The order embodied in P6 is
made as the ﬁnal act in the process of “ensuring that no person (plain(cid:415)ﬀ-respondent)
shall own agricultural land in excess of the ceiling (50 acres)” – vide  Sec(cid:415)on 2(a).”
